languages.text: "Капрал Хейдари к бою готова, {mf|сэр|мэм}!" {n}Джай салютует, но дурацкая выходка только портит ей настроение.{/n} "Нажралась я достаточно дерьма в Астра Милитарум, шерин. Да и напоминаний о стычках с {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g} и еретиками на моем теле достаточно. Вот только... бывших гвардейцев не бывает. Эта собачья жизнь глубоко во мне засела. Зато я прекрасно помню, каково это — быть маленькой, дрожащей, ничего не значащей пешкой. И потому больше ценю то, что имею".

traits.locale_text: "Капрал Хейдари к бою готова, {mf|сэр|мэм}!" {n}Джай салютует, но дурацкая выходка только портит ей настроение.{/n} "Нажралась я достаточно дерьма в Астра Милитарум, шерин. Да и напоминаний о стычках с {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g} и еретиками на моем теле достаточно. Вот только... бывших гвардейцев не бывает. Эта собачья жизнь глубоко во мне засела. Зато я прекрасно помню, каково это — быть маленькой, дрожащей, ничего не значащей пешкой. И потому больше ценю то, что имею".

languages.text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."
languages.original_text: "Капрал Хейдари к бою готова, {mf|сэр|мэм}!" {n}Джай салютует, но дурацкая выходка только портит ей настроение.{/n} "Нажралась я достаточно дерьма в Астра Милитарум, шерин. Да и напоминаний о стычках с {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносами{/g} и еретиками на моем теле достаточно. Вот только... бывших гвардейцев не бывает. Эта собачья жизнь глубоко во мне засела. Зато я прекрасно помню, каково это — быть маленькой, дрожащей, ничего не значащей пешкой. И потому больше ценю то, что имею".

traits.locale_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes, but the silly antic only sours her mood.{/n} "I had enough of Astra Militarum's shit, shereen. And bear plenty of reminders about run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics on my body. Except... There is no such thing as a former guardswoman. That wretched life got its claws in me and doesn't let go, but I know very well what being a small, shaking, insignificant pawn feels like, and it makes me appreciate what I have even more."

"Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes, but the silly antic only sours her mood.{/n} "I had enough of Astra Militarum's shit, shereen. And bear plenty of reminders about run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics on my body. Except... There is no such thing as a former guardswoman. That wretched life got its claws in me and doesn't let go, but I know very well what being a small, shaking, insignificant pawn feels like, and it makes me appreciate what I have even more."

"Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

"Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

"Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

languages.text: “海达利下士报到，长官！”{n}婕伊向你敬了个礼，但这愚蠢的举止却让她变得闷闷不乐。{/n}“我这辈子都再也不想碰星界军的那堆狗屎了，亲爱的。我已经从与{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}与异端分子的生意中赚到了足够的东西，足够让我用两辈子了。可是……每当提到帝国卫队，我都感觉根本无法真正地从过去中走出来。 那段该死的日子，至今仍把我紧紧地捏在手中。不过这也意味着，我依然记得身为一名渺小的、浑身颤抖的、无足轻重的走卒是什么感觉。正是因为这个原因，我才如此珍惜我如今拥有的一切。”
languages.original_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

traits.locale_text: “海达利下士报到，长官！”{n}婕伊向你敬了个礼，但这愚蠢的举止却让她变得闷闷不乐。{/n}“我这辈子都再也不想碰星界军的那堆狗屎了，亲爱的。我已经从与{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}与异端分子的生意中赚到了足够的东西，足够让我用两辈子了。可是……每当提到帝国卫队，我都感觉根本无法真正地从过去中走出来。 那段该死的日子，至今仍把我紧紧地捏在手中。不过这也意味着，我依然记得身为一名渺小的、浑身颤抖的、无足轻重的走卒是什么感觉。正是因为这个原因，我才如此珍惜我如今拥有的一切。”

languages.original_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with xenos and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

languages.text: «¡Cabo Heydari a su servicio, señor{mf||a}!». {n}Jae se cuadra, pero su actuación solo consigue empeorar su ánimo.{/n} «Ya he tenido bastante de las gilipolleces del Astra Militarum para toda una vida, shereen. Y mi cuerpo ya se ha llevado bastantes recuerdos de mis encuentros con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} y herejes para dos. Pero... de la Guardia nunca se puede hablar en pasado. Esa vida miserable hundió sus garras en lo más hondo de mi ser. Pero eso también significa que recuerdo lo que es ser un peón diminuto, tembloroso e insignificante, y por eso puedo apreciar mejor todo lo que tengo ahora».
languages.original_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

traits.locale_text: «¡Cabo Heydari a su servicio, señor{mf||a}!». {n}Jae se cuadra, pero su actuación solo consigue empeorar su ánimo.{/n} «Ya he tenido bastante de las gilipolleces del Astra Militarum para toda una vida, shereen. Y mi cuerpo ya se ha llevado bastantes recuerdos de mis encuentros con {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} y herejes para dos. Pero... de la Guardia nunca se puede hablar en pasado. Esa vida miserable hundió sus garras en lo más hondo de mi ser. Pero eso también significa que recuerdo lo que es ser un peón diminuto, tembloroso e insignificante, y por eso puedo apreciar mejor todo lo que tengo ahora».

languages.text: 「ヘイダリ伍長、参上いたしました、閣下！{n}ジェイは敬礼するが、くだらない芝居は彼女の気分を害しただけだった。{/n}「帝国防衛軍のくだらないたわごとはもうたくさんだよ。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}や異端者との戦いで、私の身体は一生分の土産を集めた。まあ…あの場所に「かつては」なんてものはないけどね。あの惨めな人生は、アタシにしっかりと爪痕を刻んでいる。でも、それは同時に、小さく震え、取るに足らない駒であることがどんなものかを覚えているということでもあるんだ。だからこそ、今持っているものにもっと感謝できるってわけ」
languages.original_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

traits.locale_text: 「ヘイダリ伍長、参上いたしました、閣下！{n}ジェイは敬礼するが、くだらない芝居は彼女の気分を害しただけだった。{/n}「帝国防衛軍のくだらないたわごとはもうたくさんだよ。{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}や異端者との戦いで、私の身体は一生分の土産を集めた。まあ…あの場所に「かつては」なんてものはないけどね。あの惨めな人生は、アタシにしっかりと爪痕を刻んでいる。でも、それは同時に、小さく震え、取るに足らない駒であることがどんなものかを覚えているということでもあるんだ。だからこそ、今持っているものにもっと感謝できるってわけ」

languages.text: "Corporal Heydari meldet sich zum Dienst, {mf|Sir|Madam}!" {n}Jae salutiert vor dir, doch das alberne Schauspiel senkt ihre Laune nur noch weiter.{/n} "Ich hatte für mein ganzes Leben genug von dem Scheiß des Astra Militarum, Shereen. Und mein Körper hat genug Andenken an Begegnungen mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} und Ketzern für zwei Leben gesammelt. Nur ... gibt es für die Armee kein 'früher'. Dieses erbärmliche Leben hat mich für alle Zeiten im Griff. Das heißt aber auch, dass ich mich daran erinnere, wie es ist, eine kleine, zitternde, unbedeutende Marionette zu sein. Und deswegen weiß ich umso mehr zu schätzen, was ich heute habe."
languages.original_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

traits.locale_text: "Corporal Heydari meldet sich zum Dienst, {mf|Sir|Madam}!" {n}Jae salutiert vor dir, doch das alberne Schauspiel senkt ihre Laune nur noch weiter.{/n} "Ich hatte für mein ganzes Leben genug von dem Scheiß des Astra Militarum, Shereen. Und mein Körper hat genug Andenken an Begegnungen mit {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} und Ketzern für zwei Leben gesammelt. Nur ... gibt es für die Armee kein 'früher'. Dieses erbärmliche Leben hat mich für alle Zeiten im Griff. Das heißt aber auch, dass ich mich daran erinnere, wie es ist, eine kleine, zitternde, unbedeutende Marionette zu sein. Und deswegen weiß ich umso mehr zu schätzen, was ich heute habe."

languages.text: « Caporal Heydari au rapport, chef ! » {n}Jae vous adresse un salut militaire, mais cette mascarade ne fait qu'assombrir son humeur.{/n} « J'en ai assez bavé pour toute une vie dans les rangs de l'Astra Militarum, shereen, et mon corps a gardé bien trop de souvenirs de nos affrontements contre les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} et les hérétiques. Mais la Garde... on en fait partie à vie. Cette existence misérable a planté ses griffes en moi et elle ne lâchera jamais prise. D'un autre côté, ça veut aussi dire que je me rappelle ce que ça fait d'être un pion faible et insignifiant, et c'est pour ça que je suis d'autant plus reconnaissante de ce que j'ai aujourd'hui. »
languages.original_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

traits.locale_text: « Caporal Heydari au rapport, chef ! » {n}Jae vous adresse un salut militaire, mais cette mascarade ne fait qu'assombrir son humeur.{/n} « J'en ai assez bavé pour toute une vie dans les rangs de l'Astra Militarum, shereen, et mon corps a gardé bien trop de souvenirs de nos affrontements contre les {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} et les hérétiques. Mais la Garde... on en fait partie à vie. Cette existence misérable a planté ses griffes en moi et elle ne lâchera jamais prise. D'un autre côté, ça veut aussi dire que je me rappelle ce que ça fait d'être un pion faible et insignifiant, et c'est pour ça que je suis d'autant plus reconnaissante de ce que j'ai aujourd'hui. »

languages.text: "Onbaşı Heydari emirlerinize hazırdır komutanım!" {n}Jae selam duruyor ancak yapmacıklığı, modunu daha da düşürüyor.{/n} "Bir ömür yetecek Astra Militarum teranesine katlandım. Bedenimde de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zenolarla{/g} ve kâfirlerle girdiğim çatışmalardan kalma, iki ömürlük hatıra var zaten. Muhafızlık konusuysa... Bu işin bir sonu yok. O kahrolası hayat, içime pençelerini öyle derin geçirdi ki... Aynı zamanda küçük, titrek, önemsiz bir piyon olmayı iyi hatırlıyorum. Bu yüzden de şu an sahip olduklarımın değerini biliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Corporal Heydari reporting for duty, {mf|sir|ma'am}!" {n}Jae salutes you, but the silly playacting only sours her mood.{/n} "I've had enough of the Astra Militarum's shit to last a lifetime, shereen. And my body's collected enough souvenirs from run-ins with {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} and heretics to last two lifetimes. Except... when it comes to the Guard, there's no such thing as 'used to be.' That wretched life sank its claws into me good. But that also means I remember what it's like to be a small, shaking, insignificant pawn. And that's why I appreciate what I have now all the more."

traits.locale_text: "Onbaşı Heydari emirlerinize hazırdır efendim!" {n}Jae selam duruyor ancak bu yapmacık muzipliği, modunu daha da düşürüyor.{/n} "Bir ömür yetecek kadar Astra Militarum teranesine katlandım. Bedenimde de {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g}larla ve kâfirlerle girdiğim çatışmalardan kalma, iki ömür yetecek kadar hatıra var zaten. Muhafızlık konusunda ama... Geçmiş zamanla konuşmak diye bir şey yoktur. O kahrolası hayat, içime pençelerini öyle derin geçirdi ki... Bu aynı zamanda küçük, titrek, önemsiz bir piyon olmanın nasıl bir şey olduğunu da hatırladığım anlamına geliyor ama. Bu yüzden de şu an sahip olduklarımın değerini daha iyi anlıyorum."
